titles.title: Congressional Oversight Over Trade Negotiations Act
Congressional Oversight Over Trade Negotiations Act
A bill to require the United States Trade Representative to provide documents relating to trade negotiations to Members of Congress and their staff upon request, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Congressional Oversight Over Trade Negotiations Act - Directs the United States Trade Representative (USTR) to provide access to documents, including classified materials, regarding trade agreement negotiations to which the United States is a party and policies advanced by the USTR to any Member of Congress who requests such documents as well as Member staff with proper security clearances.
